I am making a model of a samurai (or at least trying to) and I need 
to know how many pieces of armour I need to make and if anyone can 
direct me to a very well illustrated or diagram of a suit of 
armour.All help will be appreciated. Also did the horses the men ride 
have barding like the European knight's horse? If so what were the 
pieces, and what were they called and where on the horse did it go. 
     thanks allot, 
              captain nemo
